FirstIntroPage.title: A reliable future based on experience
FirstIntroPage.description: IT Time is an academy of modern professions. We teach using the latest technologies and real projects with the help of experienced professionals. Our goal is to make you a highly paid IT specialist.

card1.title: No funds? - We have a solution!
card1.description: If you don't have enough funds to attend courses, don't worry. We will help you solve this problem.

card2.title: Successfully sell your knowledge!
card2.description: We not only provide knowledge but also help you successfully sell it and start a career.

card3.title: Quality training from strong professionals!
card3.description: Our teachers are professional representatives of their fields with real work experience.

card4.title: Practice, real projects and portfolio!
card4.description: During training, you work on real projects and form your portfolio.

card5.title: Modern environment, free Coworking and Wi-Fi
card5.description: Comfortable and modern learning environment, free coworking zone and high-speed internet at your disposal.

card6.title: Certificate
card6.description: Every student who successfully completes the course receives a certificate that meets international standards.

header.title: IT TIME ACADEMY
header.subtitle: Modern IT Education Center - the best choice for learning future professions
header.description: IT TIME ACADEMY is one of the largest and most reliable programming schools in Uzbekistan. Since 2017, we have been providing quality education to thousands of young people in modern IT professions. Our goal is not only to teach programming but also to prepare each student for a successful future career. We pay special attention to the individual development of each student and use modern teaching methods.
